attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Together with Makka Pakka being in charge of health

Upsy Daisy to be primeminister, 2nd female of this country

And the rest of the cabinet to be made up from the Tombliboos and the remainder of "In the Night" Crew.

The country will show more trust and belief, and with children coming up with new ideas all the time and thinking the impossible perhaps the government wont be as intent on stealing (sorry borrowing) other parties ideas

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
